snippet: About 575 people were rescued by government vessels and small fishing boats by early Saturday morning, an official said.
abstract: At least 24 people are killed when passenger ferry carrying nearly 700 people collides with cargo ship and sinks in central Philippines; about 575 people are rescued by government vessels and small fishing boats.
lead_paragraph: About 575 people were rescued by government vessels and small fishing boats by early Saturday morning, an official said.

headline.main: Philippines: 24 Killed as Cargo Ship and Passenger Ferry Collide Off Coast
headline.print_headline: Philippines: 24 Killed as Cargo Ship And Passenger Ferry Collide Off Coast
